entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You tricked Borvo's guard into telling you where Dakk is.
entries.journal_entry_description: After your battle with the acklay in Borvo's vault, you found an intact portion of its shell.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You have managed to extract a piece of the acklay's shell. You might be able to make armor out of it.
entries.task00_message_box_text: You have managed to extract an intact piece of the acklay's shell. You should bring this to an armorsmith who knows how to turn it into a piece of armor. Since the acklay was in Borvo's vault, you might be able to dig some information out of one of his lackeys.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Trick the guard into telling you where you can find an armorsmith for the armor.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Go to the location supplied by Borvo's guard to find the Armorsmith.
